traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10 damage) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10 damage) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 20) and is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The greatwyrm uses one of the following breath weapons:

items.name: Elemental Breath
entries: The greatwyrm exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 84 ({@damage 13d12}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Sapping Breath
entries: The greatwyrm exhales gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of the greatwyrm's next turn. An {@condition unconscious} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape
entries: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.
